text: Now after [strongs id="h0310" /] the death [strongs id="h4194" /] of Moses [strongs id="h4872" /] the servant [strongs id="h5650" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] it came to pass, that the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] spake [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Nun [strongs id="h5126" /], Moses [strongs id="h4872" /]’ minister [strongs id="h8334" tvm="8764" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /],

Moses [strongs id="h4872" /] my servant [strongs id="h5650" /] is dead [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8804" /]; now therefore arise [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8798" /], go over [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8798" /] this Jordan [strongs id="h3383" /], thou, and all this people [strongs id="h5971" /], unto the land [strongs id="h0776" /] which I do give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8802" /] to them, [even] to the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /].

Every place [strongs id="h4725" /] that the sole [strongs id="h3709" /] of your foot [strongs id="h7272" /] shall tread upon [strongs id="h1869" tvm="8799" /], that have I given [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] unto you, as I said [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] unto Moses [strongs id="h4872" /].

From the wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /] and this Lebanon [strongs id="h3844" /] even unto the great [strongs id="h1419" /] river [strongs id="h5104" /], the river [strongs id="h5104" /] Euphrates [strongs id="h6578" /], all the land [strongs id="h0776" /] of the Hittites [strongs id="h2850" /], and unto the great [strongs id="h1419" /] sea [strongs id="h3220" /] toward the going down [strongs id="h3996" /] of the sun [strongs id="h8121" /], shall be your coast [strongs id="h1366" /].

There shall not any man [strongs id="h0376" /] be able to stand [strongs id="h3320" tvm="8691" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] thee all the days [strongs id="h3117" /] of thy life [strongs id="h2416" /]: as I was with Moses [strongs id="h4872" /], [so] I will be with thee: I will not fail [strongs id="h7503" tvm="8686" /] thee, nor forsake [strongs id="h5800" tvm="8799" /] thee.

Be strong [strongs id="h2388" tvm="8798" /] and of a good courage [strongs id="h0553" tvm="8798" /]: for unto this people [strongs id="h5971" /] shalt thou divide for an inheritance [strongs id="h5157" tvm="8686" /] the land [strongs id="h0776" /], which I sware [strongs id="h7650" tvm="8738" /] unto their fathers [strongs id="h0001" /] to give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8800" /] them.

Only be thou strong [strongs id="h2388" tvm="8798" /] and very [strongs id="h3966" /] courageous [strongs id="h0553" tvm="8798" /], that thou mayest observe [strongs id="h8104" tvm="8800" /] to do [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8800" /] according to all the law [strongs id="h8451" /], which Moses [strongs id="h4872" /] my servant [strongs id="h5650" /] commanded [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8765" /] thee: turn [strongs id="h5493" tvm="8799" /] not from it [to] the right hand [strongs id="h3225" /] or [to] the left [strongs id="h8040" /], that thou mayest prosper [strongs id="h7919" tvm="8686" /] whithersoever thou goest [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /].

This book [strongs id="h5612" /] of the law [strongs id="h8451" /] shall not depart [strongs id="h4185" tvm="8799" /] out of thy mouth [strongs id="h6310" /]; but thou shalt meditate [strongs id="h1897" tvm="8804" /] therein day [strongs id="h3119" /] and night [strongs id="h3915" /], that thou mayest observe [strongs id="h8104" tvm="8799" /] to do [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8800" /] according to all that is written [strongs id="h3789" tvm="8803" /] therein: for then thou shalt make [strongs id="h6743" /] thy way [strongs id="h1870" /] prosperous [strongs id="h6743" tvm="8686" /], and then thou shalt have good success [strongs id="h7919" tvm="8686" /].

Have not I commanded [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8765" /] thee? Be strong [strongs id="h2388" tvm="8798" /] and of a good courage [strongs id="h0553" tvm="8798" /]; be not afraid [strongs id="h6206" tvm="8799" /], neither be thou dismayed [strongs id="h2865" tvm="8735" /]: for the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] thy God [strongs id="h0430" /] [is] with thee whithersoever thou goest [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /].

Then Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /] commanded [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8762" /] the officers [strongs id="h7860" tvm="8802" /] of the people [strongs id="h5971" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /],

Pass [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8798" /] through [strongs id="h7130" /] the host [strongs id="h4264" /], and command [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8761" /] the people [strongs id="h5971" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /], Prepare [strongs id="h3559" tvm="8685" /] you victuals [strongs id="h6720" /]; for within three [strongs id="h7969" /] days [strongs id="h3117" /] ye shall pass over [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8802" /] this Jordan [strongs id="h3383" /], to go in [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8800" /] to possess [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8800" /] the land [strongs id="h0776" /], which the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] your God [strongs id="h0430" /] giveth [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8802" /] you to possess [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8800" /] it.

And to the Reubenites [strongs id="h7206" /], and to the Gadites [strongs id="h1425" /], and to half [strongs id="h2677" /] the tribe [strongs id="h7626" /] of Manasseh [strongs id="h4519" /], spake [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /],

Remember [strongs id="h2142" tvm="8800" /] the word [strongs id="h1697" /] which Moses [strongs id="h4872" /] the servant [strongs id="h5650" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] commanded [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8765" /] you, saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /], The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] your God [strongs id="h0430" /] hath given you rest [strongs id="h5117" tvm="8688" /], and hath given [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] you this land [strongs id="h0776" /].

Your wives [strongs id="h0802" /], your little ones [strongs id="h2945" /], and your cattle [strongs id="h4735" /], shall remain [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8799" /] in the land [strongs id="h0776" /] which Moses [strongs id="h4872" /] gave [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] you on this side [strongs id="h5676" /] Jordan [strongs id="h3383" /]; but ye shall pass [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8799" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] your brethren [strongs id="h0251" /] armed [strongs id="h2571" /], all the mighty [strongs id="h1368" /] men of valour [strongs id="h2428" /], and help [strongs id="h5826" tvm="8804" /] them;

Until the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] have given [strongs id="h5117" /] your brethren [strongs id="h0251" /] rest [strongs id="h5117" tvm="8686" /], as [he hath given] you, and they also have possessed [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8804" /] the land [strongs id="h0776" /] which the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] your God [strongs id="h0430" /] giveth [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8802" /] them: then ye shall return [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8804" /] unto the land [strongs id="h0776" /] of your possession [strongs id="h3425" /], and enjoy [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8804" /] it, which Moses [strongs id="h4872" /] the LORD’S [strongs id="h3068" /] servant [strongs id="h5650" /] gave [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] you on this side [strongs id="h5676" /] Jordan [strongs id="h3383" /] toward the sunrising [strongs id="h4217" /] [strongs id="h8121" /].

And they answered [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /], All that thou commandest [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8765" /] us we will do [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /], and whithersoever [strongs id="h0834" /] thou sendest [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] us, we will go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /].

According as we hearkened [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8804" /] unto Moses [strongs id="h4872" /] in all things, so will we hearken [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8799" /] unto thee: only the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] thy God [strongs id="h0430" /] be with thee, as he was with Moses [strongs id="h4872" /].

Whosoever [strongs id="h0376" /] [he be] that doth rebel [strongs id="h4784" tvm="8686" /] against thy commandment [strongs id="h6310" /], and will not hearken [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8799" /] unto thy words [strongs id="h1697" /] in all that thou commandest [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8762" /] him, he shall be put to death [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8714" /]: only be strong [strongs id="h2388" tvm="8798" /] and of a good courage [strongs id="h0553" tvm="8798" /].

And Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Nun [strongs id="h5126" /] sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] out of Shittim [strongs id="h7851" /] two [strongs id="h8147" /] men [strongs id="h0582" /] to spy [strongs id="h7270" tvm="8764" /] secretly [strongs id="h2791" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /], Go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8798" /] view [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8798" /] the land [strongs id="h0776" /], even Jericho [strongs id="h3405" /]. And they went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /], and came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] into an harlot’s [strongs id="h2181" tvm="8802" /] house [strongs id="h0802" /] [strongs id="h1004" /], named [strongs id="h8034" /] Rahab [strongs id="h7343" /], and lodged [strongs id="h7901" tvm="8799" /] there.

And it was told [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8735" /] the king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Jericho [strongs id="h3405" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /], Behold, there came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8804" /] men [strongs id="h0582" /] in hither to night [strongs id="h3915" /] of the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] to search out [strongs id="h2658" tvm="8800" /] the country [strongs id="h0776" /].

And the king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Jericho [strongs id="h3405" /] sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] unto Rahab [strongs id="h7343" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /], Bring forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8685" /] the men [strongs id="h0582" /] that are come [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8802" /] to thee, which are entered [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8804" /] into thine house [strongs id="h1004" /]: for they be come [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8804" /] to search out [strongs id="h2658" tvm="8800" /] all the country [strongs id="h0776" /].

And the woman [strongs id="h0802" /] took [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8799" /] the two [strongs id="h8147" /] men [strongs id="h0582" /], and hid [strongs id="h6845" tvm="8799" /] them, and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] thus, There came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8804" /] men [strongs id="h0582" /] unto me, but I wist [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /] not whence [strongs id="h0370" /] they [were]:

And it came to pass [about the time] of shutting [strongs id="h5462" tvm="8800" /] of the gate [strongs id="h8179" /], when it was dark [strongs id="h2822" /], that the men [strongs id="h0582" /] went out [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8804" /]: whither the men [strongs id="h0582" /] went [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /] I wot [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /] not: pursue [strongs id="h7291" tvm="8798" /] after [strongs id="h0310" /] them quickly [strongs id="h4118" /]; for ye shall overtake [strongs id="h5381" tvm="8686" /] them.

But she had brought them up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8689" /] to the roof [strongs id="h1406" /] of the house, and hid [strongs id="h2934" tvm="8799" /] them with the stalks [strongs id="h6086" /] of flax [strongs id="h6593" /], which she had laid in order [strongs id="h6186" tvm="8803" /] upon the roof [strongs id="h1406" /].

And the men [strongs id="h0582" /] pursued [strongs id="h7291" tvm="8804" /] after [strongs id="h0310" /] them the way [strongs id="h1870" /] to Jordan [strongs id="h3383" /] unto the fords [strongs id="h4569" /]: and as soon as they which pursued [strongs id="h7291" tvm="8802" /] after [strongs id="h0310" /] them were gone out [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8804" /], they shut [strongs id="h5462" tvm="8804" /] the gate [strongs id="h8179" /].
And before they were laid down [strongs id="h7901" tvm="8799" /], she came up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8804" /] unto them upon the roof [strongs id="h1406" /];

And she said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto the men [strongs id="h0582" /], I know [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /] that the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath given [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] you the land [strongs id="h0776" /], and that your terror [strongs id="h0367" /] is fallen [strongs id="h5307" tvm="8804" /] upon us, and that all the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of the land [strongs id="h0776" /] faint [strongs id="h4127" tvm="8738" /] because [strongs id="h6440" /] of you.

For we have heard [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8804" /] how the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] dried up [strongs id="h3001" tvm="8689" /] the water [strongs id="h4325" /] of the Red [strongs id="h5488" /] sea [strongs id="h3220" /] for you [strongs id="h6440" /], when ye came out [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8800" /] of Egypt [strongs id="h4714" /]; and what ye did [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] unto the two [strongs id="h8147" /] kings [strongs id="h4428" /] of the Amorites [strongs id="h0567" /], that [were] on the other side [strongs id="h5676" /] Jordan [strongs id="h3383" /], Sihon [strongs id="h5511" /] and Og [strongs id="h5747" /], whom ye utterly destroyed [strongs id="h2763" tvm="8689" /].

And as soon as we had heard [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8799" /] [these things], our hearts [strongs id="h3824" /] did melt [strongs id="h4549" tvm="8735" /], neither did there remain [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8804" /] any more courage [strongs id="h7307" /] in any man [strongs id="h0376" /], because [strongs id="h6440" /] of you: for the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] your God [strongs id="h0430" /], he [is] God [strongs id="h0430" /] in heaven [strongs id="h8064" /] above [strongs id="h4605" /], and in earth [strongs id="h0776" /] beneath.

Now therefore, I pray you, swear [strongs id="h7650" tvm="8734" /] unto me by the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], since [strongs id="h3588" /] I have shewed [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] you kindness [strongs id="h2617" /], that ye will also shew [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] kindness [strongs id="h2617" /] unto my father’s [strongs id="h0001" /] house [strongs id="h1004" /], and give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] me a true [strongs id="h0571" /] token [strongs id="h0226" /]:

And [that] ye will save alive [strongs id="h2421" tvm="8689" /] my father [strongs id="h0001" /], and my mother [strongs id="h0517" /], and my brethren [strongs id="h0251" /], and my sisters [strongs id="h0269" /], and all that they have, and deliver [strongs id="h5337" tvm="8689" /] our lives [strongs id="h5315" /] from death [strongs id="h4194" /].

And the men [strongs id="h0582" /] answered [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] her, Our life [strongs id="h5315" /] for yours [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8800" /], if ye utter [strongs id="h5046" tvm="8686" /] not this our business [strongs id="h1697" /]. And it shall be, when the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath given [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8800" /] us the land [strongs id="h0776" /], that we will deal [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] kindly [strongs id="h2617" /] and truly [strongs id="h0571" /] with thee.

Then she let them down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8686" /] by a cord [strongs id="h2256" /] through [strongs id="h1157" /] the window [strongs id="h2474" /]: for her house [strongs id="h1004" /] [was] upon the town [strongs id="h7023" /] wall [strongs id="h2346" /], and she dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] upon the wall [strongs id="h2346" /].

And she said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto them, Get [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8798" /] you to the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /], lest the pursuers [strongs id="h7291" tvm="8802" /] meet [strongs id="h6293" tvm="8799" /] you; and hide [strongs id="h2247" tvm="8738" /] yourselves there three [strongs id="h7969" /] days [strongs id="h3117" /], until the pursuers [strongs id="h7291" tvm="8802" /] be returned [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8800" /]: and afterward [strongs id="h0310" /] may ye go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] your way [strongs id="h1870" /].

And the men [strongs id="h0582" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto her, We [will be] blameless [strongs id="h5355" /] of this thine oath [strongs id="h7621" /] which thou hast made us swear [strongs id="h7650" tvm="8689" /].

Behold, [when] we come [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8802" /] into the land [strongs id="h0776" /], thou shalt bind [strongs id="h7194" tvm="8799" /] this line [strongs id="h8615" /] of scarlet [strongs id="h8144" /] thread [strongs id="h2339" /] in the window [strongs id="h2474" /] which thou didst let us down by [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8689" /]: and thou shalt bring [strongs id="h0622" tvm="8799" /] thy father [strongs id="h0001" /], and thy mother [strongs id="h0517" /], and thy brethren [strongs id="h0251" /], and all thy father’s [strongs id="h0001" /] household [strongs id="h1004" /], home [strongs id="h1004" /] unto thee.

And it shall be, [that] whosoever [strongs id="h0834" /] shall go out [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /] of the doors [strongs id="h1817" /] of thy house [strongs id="h1004" /] into the street [strongs id="h2351" /], his blood [strongs id="h1818" /] [shall be] upon his head [strongs id="h7218" /], and we [will be] guiltless [strongs id="h5355" /]: and whosoever shall be with thee in the house [strongs id="h1004" /], his blood [strongs id="h1818" /] [shall be] on our head [strongs id="h7218" /], if [any] hand [strongs id="h3027" /] be upon him.

And if thou utter [strongs id="h5046" tvm="8686" /] this our business [strongs id="h1697" /], then we will be quit [strongs id="h5355" /] of thine oath [strongs id="h7621" /] which thou hast made us to swear [strongs id="h7650" tvm="8689" /].

And she said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], According unto your words [strongs id="h1697" /], so [be] it. And she sent them away [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8762" /], and they departed [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /]: and she bound [strongs id="h7194" tvm="8799" /] the scarlet [strongs id="h8144" /] line [strongs id="h8615" /] in the window [strongs id="h2474" /].

And they went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /], and came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] unto the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /], and abode [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8799" /] there three [strongs id="h7969" /] days [strongs id="h3117" /], until the pursuers [strongs id="h7291" tvm="8802" /] were returned [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8804" /]: and the pursuers [strongs id="h7291" tvm="8802" /] sought [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8762" /] [them] throughout all the way [strongs id="h1870" /], but found [strongs id="h4672" tvm="8804" /] [them] not.

So the two [strongs id="h8147" /] men [strongs id="h0582" /] returned [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8799" /], and descended [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8799" /] from the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /], and passed over [strongs id="h5674" tvm="8799" /], and came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] to Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Nun [strongs id="h5126" /], and told [strongs id="h5608" tvm="8762" /] him all [things] that befell [strongs id="h4672" tvm="8802" /] them:

And they said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /], Truly [strongs id="h3588" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath delivered [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] into our hands [strongs id="h3027" /] all the land [strongs id="h0776" /]; for even all the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of the country [strongs id="h0776" /] do faint [strongs id="h4127" tvm="8738" /] because [strongs id="h6440" /] of us.
